answers.answer: I'm going thru the same thing. I'll be 32 weeks on Tuesday. My baby's been trying to come already and I've hospitalized twice for him. They diagnosed me with gestational diabetes and put me on bed rest and insulin..so if you're experiencing too much dizziness or fatigue, I'd talk with your ob about testing for gestational diabetes if they haven't already...

question: I am 32 weeks pregnant now. I am having the hardest time walking around anywhere for more than like 10 mins!! I get dizzy and winded and feel like my belly weights a zillion lbs. I am constantly fatigued and dehydrated. Idk what to do! I don't remember feeling this bad with my first baby 6 years ago!! Anyone else having this hard of a time?
title: walking
